name: My Virtual Tutor: Kindergarten to 1st Grade
name_original: My Virtual Tutor: Kindergarten to 1st Grade
description:
With My Virtual Tutor your child will conquer early reading through individualized, adaptive learning exercises and interactive books - all while having fun!

My Virtual Tutor: Kindergarten through 1st Grade includes 8 Interactive Books with 4 Different Play Modes to make learning to read Fun, Affordable and Portable! While holding the DS like a an actual book for realism and using the touch screen only, kids will learn to read using Mentor Interactive's propriety Foundations to Literacy software and virtual tutor. Each interactive book is fully adaptive to the readers' ability and covers the Department of Educations' 5 reading areas including phonemic awareness, phonics, comprehension, fluency, and vocabulary. All the benefits of a tutor - all the portability of the DS!
